another amazing episode of mind chum
so guys in today's video we are going to
discuss the impact of minecraft
education edition are you guys excited
so let's get started so keep up with me
till the end comment right below this

videos
minecraft has outgrown its humble
beginnings in 2011 and has since become
the top sold video game of all time this
massive growth has brought a huge player
base that is dedicated to bettering the
game by providing feedback and help
whenever and wherever they can
like its player base majing the current
developers behind the new content of
minecraft have created minecraft
education edition that is dedicated to
improving learning and retention for
school students
minecraft
education edition is a guided experience
that takes players through various
challenges designed to teach them stem
skills problem solving curriculum
lessons and collaboration with others
all while ensuring they have an outlet
to expand their creativity it also opens
up new forms and techniques of teaching
particular topics that are easier to
comprehend and put into practice
minecraft education edition's vision
majang had a simple plan for minecraft
education edition creating a program
that can give students 21st century
skills they will be able to apply in
their future workspaces while
maintaining a high level of attention
and retention of the material by
combining the core gameplay mechanics of
minecraft and various education-based
challenges mojang successfully
integrated education into its massively
popular game
as a 3d building game minecraft already
aids in training and improving
creativity hand-eye coordination and
resource management to take this a step
further majing focused its efforts on
introducing stem learning systems such
as coding and chemistry and allowing
students to work collectively on
challenges to promote collaboration and
leadership skills it also provided
teachers with the tools to design lesson
plans and teach students topics that are
required to be taught as per their
school curriculum minecraft education
addition in schools
as an educational program minecraft
education edition is dedicated to
helping both students and teachers in
schools around the world effectively
learn and teach respectively with the
tools available in this edition teachers
can create lesson plans within minecraft
and assign tasks to students while
providing detailed explanations through
the chalkboard or through customizable
npc to guide the students through the
lesson
students have a limited block palette in
education edition dependent on the
lesson plan created by the teacher and
must use those blocks minecraft's
gameplay mechanics and collaboration to
ensure they complete the set tasks
they can take pictures using the camera
tool to catalog the completion of tasks
which can be accessed anytime within
that world and visit links provided by
npc to give them more information on
certain topics
this functionality allows teachers to
tailor their lessons to teach students
particular subjects and focus on certain
topics
the interactive learning method used in
minecraft education edition does not
simply teach students about these topics
but encourages them to find creative
paths towards the completion of tasks
thus improving their knowledge on these
topics
minecraft education edition success
in the 21st century there has been a
shift in teaching methods as more and
more teachers have started to prefer
digital teachings as it is more
interactive and engaging for students
two things that can greatly improve
retention of information with a growing
community of over seven thousand
classrooms students around the world can
enjoy learning various subjects in
minecraft education additions such as
matte computer science chemistry physics
history art and so much more
teachers and students continue to find
success within the worlds of minecraft
education addition thanks to its
interactive and completely customizable
learning experience
teachers can continue to design lessons
in creative ways and fill them with
important topics while students continue
to enjoy the 3d world and find new and
creative solutions to lessons in
education edition
all while progressing through the school
curriculum
minecraft education edition is available
through licenses for ios and pc
minecraft is available for mobile pc ps4
ps5 switch xbox one and xbox series x or
